Description: The presentation in the temple; Simeon standing left of the altar, the Virgin at right presenting the Child; St Joseph, Anna and a male figure standing behind her; a young girl kneeling in front of Simeon with a birdcage; behind a screen in background a landscape with the Massacre of the Innocents and the Flight into Egypt; illustration to an unidentified German publication; late impression. 1508 Woodcut and letterpress
